title: Strengthening Curriculum Development Competencies: Inclusive Design of Digital Training Systems for Science Practitioners

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Instructional design competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can analyze inclusive interface design elements (e.g., adaptive feedback, multilingual support) in digital training systems and apply them to evaluation tools.
Learners can prototype science training content restructured to account for cultural and cognitive diversity.
Learners can propose inclusive design solutions applicable to real work environments through project-based assessments.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
